sentences.sentence: Flight is the form of locomotion that puts the greatest demands on muscles.
sentences.translation: 飞行是对肌肉要求最高的运动形式。

sentences.sentence: The higher their capacity to bind at the receptors, the higher their ability to stimulate locomotion.
sentences.translation: 它们结合受体的能力越强，它们刺激运动的能力就越强。

sentences.sentence: "In general," they reported, "the ability of the compounds to compete at the receptors correlates with their ability to stimulate locomotion in the mouse."
sentences.translation: “总的来说，”他们报告称，“化合物在受体上的竞争能力与它们刺激老鼠运动的能力有关。”
